0.name: Emberling
0.description: A small, fiery creature with a mischievous personality. It loves to play pranks on unsuspecting travelers.

0.name: Infernotaur
0.description: A fierce beast made entirely of flames. It is highly aggressive and will attack anything that comes too close.

0.name: Pyroclasm
0.description: A towering inferno of a creature that leaves a trail of destruction in its wake. It is said that its roar can cause volcanic eruptions.

1.name: Sproutling
1.description: A cute and friendly creature made of leaves and vines. It enjoys basking in the sun and helping out with gardening.

1.name: Thornbloom
1.description: A plant-based creature with a sharp and thorny exterior. It is fiercely protective of its Sproutling companions and will defend them at all costs.

1.name: Verdantian
1.description: A towering, ancient creature that embodies the power of nature. It is said that it can control the elements and heal the sick with its presence.

2.name: Coralite
2.description: A small and gentle creature that resembles a piece of coral. It is peaceful and spends most of its time floating near the ocean floor.

2.name: Crushstream
2.description: A fast and aggressive creature that resembles a shark. It is feared by many sailors and can take down entire ships with ease.

2.name: Leviathan
2.description: A massive sea serpent that can swallow entire islands whole. It is rarely seen and only emerges from the depths of the ocean during times of great danger.
